summary: I've waited for Dat Grass for so long that i made my own version. Hope you enjoy!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff7700][b][i]If you want dense grass then you came to the right place! I made my own dense grass mod after waiting so long for Dat Grass to Come back. It might be FPS intensive, but I have constant 60fps most of the time w/o ENB. I use a GTX770 2GB, 9GB of Ram, and an i7 2600k@3.4Ghz[/i][/b]
[/color]
[b][u][color=#00ff00][size=4]To install:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
[b]1.Just install with NMM
2.In Skyrim.ini setÂ iMinGrassSize= to 70-120 for better performance and 20-35 for best look
[/b]
Does not require any other mods so enjoy!

BTW. I will probably not work on this because I only made this because I wanted Dense grass and there is nothing to fix. I might add some textures some time soon, but I don't really know my plan for this mod.

[b][u][color=#00ff00]Compatibilty:[/color][/u][/b]
[color=#00ff00]Compatible with any mod, but if you are using different grass mods the grass will look different.[/color]
author: TheDrDocter
